summary: Adds a nice small house for a hunter and adventurer characters to the lake north of falkreath.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/22314-1-1360348405.jpg[/img]

~~~NEW VERSION!~~~

Adds a nice small house (just one medium room, and - sorry - no mannequins... ;) ) for a hunter and adventurer character to the lake north of falkreath.
I made this place because i couldn\'t find a house (-mod) i REALLY liked (hope that doesn\'t sound arrogant - most houses are too over the top for my taste). 
It\'s navmeshed, followers will follow in and out.


[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/22314-1-1360326685.jpg[/img]


How to get it:

You need a key, look behind the house...


How to install manually:

Just drop the .esp into the data folder where u installed skyrim.


What it has:
(I know I said I won\'t make any changes... um... whatever ;) ) 

- Enough containers. All set to no respawn.
- Alchemy table
- Blacksmith area with all u need
- Archery targets
- Some nice details... I think :)
~~~NEW:~~~
- Smelter
- Enchanting Table
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Version 1.5

Last changes:
- I cleaned the mod once again. Actually it was okay before, now it\'s even cleaner.
- As mentioned, now with smelter and enchanting table
- New lighting and (finally) music inside the house
- Some small changes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I hope you guys like it and think that it fits to the world!

If something\'s wrong, please let me know immediately.  

cheers!

My other mod: [http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31620/]

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/22314-1-1360327574.jpg[/img]
author: Frank0815
